Equipment Actions.Action 1: Crush, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Bludgeoning, If the target is Medium or smaller, the Darkmantle attaches itself to the targets head, blinding and suffocating them

Other Actions.Action 1: Darkness Aura, The Darkmantle extends a 15ft radius of magical darkness which moves with it.  Darkvision can not penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it.  The darkness can extinguish any magical light of 2nd level or lower

Abilities.Ability 1: Echolocation, The Darkmantle can not use its blindsight while deafened
Abilities.Ability 2: False Appearance, While the Darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite
